alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Grant; Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 7:19PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Cleveland, southeastern Grant, Jefferson, northwestern Lincoln and west central Arkansas Counties through 745 PM CST... At 719 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rison to Hebron. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Star City... Rison... White Hall... Altheimer... Grady... Kingsland... Whitefield... Woodville... Tipton... Nebo... Feenyville... Lamont... Cottondale... Linwood... Cane Creek State Park... Hebron... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Madding... Kedron... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for southeastern Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas.
